description: Gets information about the scaling activities in the account and Region. When scaling events occur, you see a record of the scaling activity in the scaling activities. For more information, see Verify a scaling activity for an Auto Scaling group in the Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling User Guide. If the scaling event succeeds, the value of the StatusCode element in the response is Successful. If an attempt to launch instances failed, the StatusCode value is Failed or Cancelled and the StatusMessage element in the response indicates the cause of the failure. For help interpreting the StatusMessage, see Troubleshooting Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling in the Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling User Guide.

parameters.name: ActivityIds
parameters.description: The activity IDs of the desired scaling activities. If you omit this property, all activities for the past six weeks are described. If unknown activities are requested, they are ignored with no error. If you specify an Auto Scaling group, the results are limited to that group. Array Members: Maximum number of 50 IDs. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Activities
nested_items.description: The scaling activities. Activities are sorted by start time. Activities still in progress are described first.

nested_items.name: AutoScalingGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the Auto Scaling group.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A friendly, more verbose description of the activity.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The start time of the activity.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The end time of the activity.

nested_items.name: StatusCode
nested_items.description: The current status of the activity.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: A friendly, more verbose description of the activity status.

nested_items.name: Progress
nested_items.description: A value between 0 and 100 that indicates the progress of the activity.

nested_items.name: AutoScalingGroupState
nested_items.description: The state of the Auto Scaling group, which is either InService or Deleted.

nested_items.name: AutoScalingGroupARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Auto Scaling group.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A string that indicates that the response contains more items than can be returned in a single response. To receive additional items, specify this string for the NextToken value when requesting the next set of items. This value is null when there are no more items to return.
